definition: to go through challenging experiences/to become seasoned (in one's profession etc)
to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract
to crawl/to climb/to get up or sit up
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Let children play as they will unless they break their heads.
sentences.chinese: 放手讓孩子玩，摸爬滾打，不頭破血流就可以。

sentences.english: They’ve also had years of practice.
sentences.chinese: 而且他們已經摸爬滾打多年。

sentences.english: My future is fighting in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 我的未來在黑暗的世界裏摸爬滾打。

sentences.english: He has finally learned some skill after tough training in the army for years.
sentences.chinese: 他在部隊裏摸爬滾打了幾年，總算學到一身本事。
